tridentine_1960.name: Roman Calendar 1960 (John XXIII)
tridentine_1960.description: Roman Missal according to the 1960 rubrics (John XXIII).

01-01.name: Circumcision of the Lord
01-01.description: Feast of the Circumcision of Jesus.
01-01.bio: The Circumcision of the Lord was celebrated on January 1st in the traditional calendar.

01-02.name: Saint Basil the Great
01-02.description: Bishop and Doctor of the Church.
01-02.bio: Saint Basil (329-379), Bishop of Caesarea, great theologian and Father of the Eastern Church.

roman_1970.name: Roman Calendar 1970 (Paul VI)
roman_1970.description: Roman Missal according to the post-Vatican II reform (Paul VI).

01-01.name: Mary, Mother of God
01-01.description: Solemnity of Mary, Mother of God.
01-01.bio: Mary, mother of Jesus, venerated as Mother of God in the Catholic tradition.
